ico_data.short_desc: Decent.bet is a transparent, smart contract based sports betting platform and online casino that distrubutes 100% of profits back to the community.
ico_data.description: The Decent.bet ICO began on September 23 with less than a week left and we raised 49,000 ETH. You can purchase DBET tokens to hold, trade, gamble on the platform or to participate in our "Be the House", 100% profit give back model.  Decent.bet has already developed technology funded by the founders before the ICO has finished providing unprecedented value to ICO the participants.
